about_me.title: ABOUT ME
about_me.description: Systems Engineer with experience in FullStack Development, using the tools Angular, React, Laravel, Express.js, Vue.js and DJango, as well as the development of database models in MySQL and MongoDB. I have experience in cross-platform Software Development through Kivy, Python and Ionic, as well as agile software development methodologies such as SCRUM. Outstanding creative skills, constant learning and teamwork.
about_me.description_2: I am motivated by the development of web or software projects with high quality and security standards, to boost the growth and impact of applications through an exceptional user experience and cutting-edge technological development, in companies that seek effective solutions. and/or greater visibility in the current market.

skills.title: SOME OF MY QUALITIES AND SKILLS
skills.description: Autodidact. Analysis capacity. Teamwork. Customer Support. Responsable. Creative and curious.
skills.footer: This section is just a sample, as a developer I consider that the person who has the ability to program, design or style can do it in any language or using any tool, it could take a short time to learn them, but in the end they can turn them into skills.

desktop.title: Desktop Development
desktop.description: Experience in custom development of software applications, ensuring quality and safety at all times.

frontend.title: FrontEnd Development
frontend.description: Solid knowledge in frontend development, which guarantees the optimal solution for each project.

backend.title: BackEnd Development
backend.description: Extensive knowledge of development of stored procedures, Web Services, Apis, sql and nosql databases.

mobile_apps.title: Mobile Application Development
mobile_apps.description: When I develop desktop and web applications, at the same time I give them support for a mobile application, be it from the S.O. Android or iOS.

freenlance.title: Freelance
freenlance.description: I currently work independently, but when I have a full-time job, I can do projects in my spare time depending on the complexity of the project.
